price: 18. Ad (žmonės) neigė (savo Pranašą Hudą). Ir koks (baisus) buvo Mano kankinimas ir Mano Perspėjimas?
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kadhabat ʿādun fakayfa kāna ʿadhābī wanudhuri
